title: How to connect to hidden WiFi on windows 7 - Quora

response.answer_text: The additional information after your question sounds a bit hostile, but I digress.  If I were in your shoes, I'd go through the order of everything again to ensure I didn't mis-write or mis-remember information.  You may be entering the password into an incorrect security or encryption type.  Go into the admin panel of the access point's setting and double check the SSID, password, and encryption type.  Also, though it may sound trivial, ensure your router's is outputting in a frequency your computer understands. In other words, most devices can utilize the 2.4GHz signal, and some can also utilize the 5GHz but not every device can use 5GHz, so ensure that matches.  Then do the usual... Go into your Network and Sharing settings, select "Set up a New Connection or Network". when the Set up Connection Wizard window pops up, select "Manually connect to a wireless network".  Input the Network name, security type, encryption type (if necessary) and password (Security key), and Accept/OK.
